name: Wall Quinn
description: I have been using these camera for 1 years. No problem so far.

name: Mason Hart
description: Great camera. Perfect product for young budding photographer..... Useful for in-house, nature, functions, and spare time photography.

name: Green Petersen
description: Fast moving subjects cannot be captured as expected due to its poor auto focus performance. It take about 3 to 6 seconds to focus in internal lighting conditions and it fail to focus several times in dim lights.

name: Pamela Kramer
description: If you want to upgrade your camera from point and shoot to a dslr then it is a good camera for you but if you want to start videography then don't buy it auto focus of video is too much bad.

name: Arlene Weaver
description: I am really fully content with the product. It reached me within two days with everything content in it and no doubt in a very good condition

name: Jordan Scott
description: The camera comes with a 18-55 lens that is self acclaimed for beginners. Do master your parameters with this lens then you can obviously go for desired range of lens available in the market.
